titleStmt.title: Woodalls viaticum: the path-way to the surgions chest Containing chirurgicall instrvctions for the yonger sort of surgions now imployed in the service of His Maiestie for the intended reliefe of Rochell. And composed by Iohn Woodall, one of the present masters or governors of the companie of Barber surgions London. Intended chiefly for the better curing of wounds made by gun-shott. Published by authoritie.
titleStmt.author: Woodall, John, 1556?-1643.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A helpe to the surgions chest.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
